comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: This statue (1866) and the one of Queen Victoria (1888 so not around at the time this was taken) have been moved around Queen's Square like a couple of chess pieces. This is its original position, shown on a Henry King photo - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363479550/] More details at www.publicartaroundtheworld.com/Prince_Albert_Statue.html

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Great thanks! Good to know what the full inscription reads.
